sub_title: COO - Digital - Private Equity - Scaling - Diversity
summary:
Madelein is an experienced board member and transformational leader. She has a mentoring leadership style and passionately embraces diversity in all its forms, resulting in an ability to build strong teams under stressful circumstances. This often happens in business transformation, such as post acquisition by Private Equity, post merger or when embarking on a digital roadmap. 

Recent executive roles include:
- COO (Interim): Scale up SaaS platform. Restructuring operations. Coaching leadership through downturn.
- CIO: Transformational role in an #EVCharging environment to prepare for IPO via SPAC with leading PE
- COO (Interim): Financial services company building a new cloud driven digital platform speeding up client cycles and significantly reducing costs; participated in fund raising seeking new investment
- CIO: transformational role to IPO a PE held company in the financial services industry; transformed the digital platform and IT following a large number of acquisitions

She thrives in environments where there is a mandate to do things differently, the pressure is on and teams are empowered to move fast. 

She has an entrepreneurial streak, and believes in the power of technology to disrupt our world, for the better, in the near future. She has run her own company, with two partners, building software apps for the healthcare industry. 

She also holds a portfolio of Non-Executive directorships to expand her board experience. Past roles included:
- NED at a regional insurer responsible for the digital portfolio. This role required DNB approval. 
- NED at a second tier accountancy firm, responsible for the portfolio of technology & digitalization.
- NED at a niche player in the heavily regulated trust & compliance branch. The supervisory board managed many stakeholders supporting a change of strategy and resulting sale to Private Equity
- NED at a niche technology player. A Microsoft partner changing strategy.  

She mentors startups and women, encouraging others in their growth. As a Big 4 trained Chartered Accountant, she has a natural affinity for numbers and KPIs and excels where finance meets digital technology. 

Keywords include: end-to-end responsible for IT in a multinational, listed & regulated environment; private equity held organizations; corporate finance including preparing IM & DD; delivering new digital capabilities; leading outsourcing relationships; executing crisis management on distressed IT programs; business transformation.

Leadership makes all the difference to the future we will face.
